content: this legal case involves two parties sklep and vrhovno sodišče rs ii dor 4422021 the case has gone through several steps including a cost procedure and a first instance judgment although the details of these steps are not provided the case then moved to the supreme court where a decision was made on december 15 2021 the court ruled that the plaintiff and the defendant will each receive a 50 share of a real estate plot an application related to the case was dismissed the specific laws mentioned in the case are the marriage family relations act and the civil procedure act the supreme court issued a decision regarding the admissibility of a revision based on the conditions set in the civil procedure act the court found that the applicant and the first defendant coown a property with the applicant having a 13 share the court also determined that the second defendant owes the applicant money and vice versa for the third defendant the court ruled that the second defendants claim against the third defendant should be set off against the amount owed to the applicant the judgment dismissed the claim for half of the applicants share of the property the applicant requested registration and payment from the first defendant the court of first instance upheld the judgment and dismissed the appeals the applicant and the first defendant were former cohabitees the applicant disputes the courts consideration of their incomes and expenses and also claims the return of a gift and reimbursement for joint investments the applicants revision is based on various points including violations of civil procedure and substantive law the supreme court allowed a review of the decision but dismissed the application for further review the decision was made unanimously by a chamber of members

metadata.CASE_ID: Sklep Vrhovnega sodišča RS II DoR 442/2021, 15. 12. 2021
